title: North American robot orders rise by 6.6% in 2025, reports A3
description:
In 2025, North American robot orders from non-automotive customers led the way, with cobots gaining more traction as well.

The post North American robot orders rise by 6.6% in 2025, reports A3 appeared first on The Robot Report.
